duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Property Manager in fiscal planning, staff supervision, physical property management, rent collection, and resident relations.
Oversee the occupancy and recertification process.
Supervise maintenance, security, landscaping, and cleaning departments as needed.
Assist in reviewing inventory and maintenance purchases, conducting apartment and property inspections, and writing service orders.
Assist in budget preparation and financial management.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma required; Associates or bachelor’s degree preferred.
